hero.title: Smart Farm Analysis with AI
hero.subtitle: Transform your palm oil farming with AI-powered soil and leaf analysis
hero.description: Upload your lab reports and get instant AI insights, recommendations, and trend analysis to optimize your farm's productivity.

features.title: AGS AI Assistant - 11 Core Features
features.subtitle: Smart Farming Intelligence for Palm Oil Plantations
features.tagline: Your personal farming expert that analyzes soil and leaf test reports using artificial intelligence
features.simpleProcess: Simple Process: Upload Report → AI Analyzes → Get Recommendations

feature1.title: Smart Document Reading (OCR & AI)
feature1.description: Automatically reads PDF reports from any laboratory, extracts all data without manual typing. Works with different lab formats, handwritten or scanned documents. Processes in ~30 seconds.

feature2.title: Intelligent Nutrient Analysis
feature2.description: Compares results against MPOB standards. Color-coded severity levels: GREEN (Balanced), YELLOW (Low), RED (Critical). Shows exact gaps for every nutrient.

feature3.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
feature3.description: Powered by Google Gemini AI, providing three investment options: HIGH (Fast, premium), MEDIUM (Balanced), LOW (Budget). Includes exact product names, application rates, cost estimates in RM.

feature4.title: Regenerative Agriculture Integration
feature4.description: Sustainable practices to reduce long-term fertilizer dependence: EFB Mulching, Leguminous Cover Crops, Composting, Biochar Application.

feature5.title: Economic Impact Forecasting
feature5.description: 5-year financial projections for each investment option with year-by-year breakdown: Investment costs, Yield improvements, Additional revenue, Net profit, ROI percentage.

feature6.title: Professional PDF Reports
feature6.description: Export complete analysis to PDF format with professional formatting suitable for meetings. Includes complete nutrient analysis tables, color-coded severity indicators, all AI recommendations.

feature7.title: Historical Data Tracking
feature7.description: Saves every analysis automatically. Compare results across different time periods. Track improvements from treatments. Identify seasonal patterns.

feature8.title: Multi-Farm Management
feature8.description: Manage multiple plantations from one dashboard. Track different blocks or estates separately. Compare performance across locations.

feature9.title: User Authentication & Data Security
feature9.description: Secure login with email and password. Bank-level encryption (Google Firebase). Role-based access control. Automatic cloud backup.

feature10.title: Mobile-Friendly Design
feature10.description: Works perfectly on smartphones and tablets. Upload photos of reports directly from phone camera. Responsive design adapts to screen size.

feature11.title: Admin Panel (For Managers)
feature11.description: Configure AI analysis settings. Manage user accounts and permissions. Monitor system usage. View organization-wide reports.

soil.title: Soil Analysis
soil.description: Upload soil test PDFs and get AI-powered analysis of pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium levels with MPOB standard comparisons.

leaf.title: Leaf Analysis
leaf.description: Analyze leaf nutrient content and receive fertilizer recommendations based on optimal palm oil standards.

reports.title: Smart Reports
reports.description: Generate comprehensive PDF reports with graphs, trends, and actionable recommendations.

trends.title: Historical Trends
trends.description: Track your farm's progress over time with visual analytics and year-to-year comparisons.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
pricing.currencyNote: Payments processed securely in euros (€). Ringgit prices shown for reference only.
